Uses of Package
edu.stanford.nlp.mt.base

  • Packages that use edu.stanford.nlp.mt.base 
    Package Description
    edu.stanford.nlp.mt  
    edu.stanford.nlp.mt.base
    MT Common data structures and routines.
    edu.stanford.nlp.mt.decoder.feat
    Standard Featurizers for Statistical Machine Translation.
    edu.stanford.nlp.mt.decoder.feat.oracle
    Standard featurizers making use of reference translations.
    edu.stanford.nlp.mt.decoder.h
    Search heuristics.
    edu.stanford.nlp.mt.decoder.inferer
    Inference routines and data structures - argmax_e psi(f,e) * wts.
    edu.stanford.nlp.mt.decoder.inferer.impl
    Implementation of various search routines for - argmax_f psi(f,e) * wts.
    edu.stanford.nlp.mt.decoder.recomb
    Hypothesis recombination filters.
    edu.stanford.nlp.mt.decoder.util  
    edu.stanford.nlp.mt.metrics
    Evaluation metrics.
    edu.stanford.nlp.mt.tools
    Mixed bag of command line utilities.
    edu.stanford.nlp.mt.train
    Training routines for base generative models (e.g., phrase tables, lexical reordering models).
    edu.stanford.nlp.mt.tune
    Model tuning routines.
    edu.stanford.nlp.mt.tune.optimizers  
    eu.monnetproject.translation.phrasal  
    eu.monnetproject.translation.phrasal.lm  
    eu.monnetproject.translation.phrasal.mert  
    eu.monnetproject.translation.phrasal.pt
